description:
In this course you will learn how to set up your own professional business email addresses. This is to make a better impression in a professional setting, where an @gmail or an @yahoo address isn't optimal.

You will learn how to find a suitable domain for you and how to register it. You will learn how to set up a hosting account to store your ingoing and outgoing emails.

Then, we will set up a very powerful mail client called Mozilla Thunderbird to organize your emails.

This is a short course that can be completed in under two hours. Setting up emails is really simple.

If you care about making a good impression, this course is perfect for you.
title: Set Up Professional Business Email Addresses
